images.caption: Figure 2:Inference time(seconds per image) for high-resolution image generation methods. The vertical axis is a logarithmic scale.

Figure 3:Illustration of the training and inference processes. The generator is trained in the latent space to reconstruct images at any resolution and aspect ratio. During inference, it can be applied to improve various diffusion models, enabling them to generate images of arbitrary resolution across various tasks.
Figure 4:Visualizations of arbitrary image generation.The proposed InfGen improves the generation ability for LDMs[29]across various resolutions. More visual examples are provided in the appendix.
